_comments.Intro: To run as a normal npm extension:
_comments.step_2: give it a name and file location that points to the main js file
_comments.step_3: run npm install -g from this folder
_comments.step_4: run npm link from this folder to have changes in source move to dist
_comments.step_5: run like a normal npm package, do ex. azcrypt --help to test if successful
